variable.label: Motor Frequency and EMF sample Rate
Analog operation with accel/decel from CV3/4
Consist Address
variable.comment: Allows permanent storage of consist address. Range 0-127

variable.label: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
Direction Dependent stops with asymmetrical DCC

enumChoice.choice: Stops when Right rail is higher voltage
Stops when Left rail is higher voltage

variable.label: Voltage Reference
variable.tooltip: CV 57, Value divided by 10 is voltage applied to motor at full speed, 0 = automatic adjustment

variable.label: BEMF Intensity
variable.tooltip: CV 58, Controls how much BEMF (0-no BEMF to 255-max)

enumChoice.choice: Use mapping stored by POM CV61=98 method

variable.label: EMF Feedback Cutoff Intensity
variable.tooltip: CV 113, Controls how much Feedback Cutoff

enumChoice.choice: Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0
Turns off when speed is greater than 0

variable.label: km/h speed regulation control and range
km/h speed regulation control number readout

enumChoice.choice: Automatic stops, Signal controlled speed influence or Asymmetric DCC
Automatic and Manual stops with immediate braking

variable.label: Total volume
variable.tooltip: 65 is highest distortion-free play back, INC=5. CV266

variable.label: Virtual cam chuff frequency
variable.tooltip: The lower the value the higher the chuff frequency and vice versa, INC=1. CV267

variable.label: Overlapping effect at high speeds
variable.tooltip: Useful up to about 30, see manual, INC=1. CV271

variable.label: Blow-off time
variable.tooltip: How long after start-up blow-off occurs, INC=10. CV272

variable.label: Delayed start after blow-off time
variable.tooltip: 0 = no delay, 1 = blow-off on speed step 1, 2+ = 10ths of seconds, INC=1. CV273

variable.label: Blow-off schedule
variable.tooltip: Blow-off suppressed by shunting, 10ths of seconds, INC=10. CV274

variable.label: Chuff volume at low speed and no load
Chuff volume at high speed and no load
Degree of volume change under load
Load influence for diesel engines
variable.tooltip: See manual! 0=no influence, reacts to motor speed only, 1-255, load influence increases with number. CV280

variable.label: Acceleration threshold for full load sound
Duration of reduced volume on deceleration
Brake squeal threshold
variable.tooltip: Internal speed step below which brake squeal starts, INC=10. CV287

variable.label: Minimum driving time before brake squeal
variable.tooltip: Unless loco is driven for this time Brake squeal will be surpressed (0-25sec), INC=10. CV288

variable.label: On/off key for engine and random sound
variable.tooltip: Defines the key that turns the engine and random sounds on or off. CV310

variable.label: On/off key for function sound
variable.tooltip: Defines the key that turns the function sounds (e.g. F2 bell) on or off. CV311

variable.label: Blow-off key
variable.tooltip: Defines the key to play-back the blow-off sound manually. CV312

variable.label: Mute key
variable.tooltip: Defines key to fade in and out driving sounds. CV313

variable.label: Fade in/out time
variable.tooltip: Time of fade in 10ths of second. 0 is same as 10 (1sec). CV314

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z1
variable.tooltip: Seconds. By default, the compressor is assigned to Z1. See manual!. CV315

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z1
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z1. See manual!. CV316

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z1
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV317

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z2
variable.tooltip: Seconds. By default, coal shoveling is assigned to Z2. See manual!. CV318

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z2
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z2. See manual!. CV319

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z2
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV320

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z3
variable.tooltip: Seconds. By default, the injector is assigned to Z3. See manual!. CV321

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z3
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z3. See manual!. CV322

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z3
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV323

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z4
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z4. See manual!. CV324

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z4
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z4. See manual!. CV325

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z4
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV326

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z5
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z5. See manual!. CV327

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z5
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z5. See manual!. CV328

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z5
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV329

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z6
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z6. See manual!. CV330

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z6
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z6. See manual!. CV331

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z6
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV332

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z7
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z7. See manual!. CV333

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z7
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z7. See manual!. CV334

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z7
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV335

variable.label: Minimum interval for random generator Z8
variable.tooltip: Seconds. There is no default assignment for Z8. See manual!. CV336

variable.label: Maximum interval for random generator Z8
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Defines the maximum time interval between 2 consecutive pulses of the random generator Z8. See manual!. CV337

variable.label: Playback length for random generator Z8
variable.tooltip: Seconds. Play back time for associated sound. See manual!. CV338

variable.label: Switch input 1 playback time
variable.tooltip: Seconds. 0 = Play sample back once (as recorded). CV341

variable.label: Switch input 2 playback time
variable.tooltip: (If not used for the cam sensor) Seconds. 0 = Play sample back once (as recorded). CV342

factReset.label: HARD RESET all CVs reset to default values
HARD RESET all CVs reset to default for the current Sound Project
HARD RESET for LGB operation (14 speed steps,pulse chain)

label.label: A 'Hundreds' digit of 1 offsets the mid value for 'coreless' motors
Tens digit is the Proportional value, mid value = 5
Ones digit is the integral value, mid value = 5
With default setting of 0, proportional value auto adjusts and integral value is equivalent to 5

display.item: Motor Frequency and EMF sample Rate

label.label: 0 = 20/40KHz (set with CV112) and sample rate auto adjusts between 200Hz (low speed) and 50Hz
Tens digit = Sampling rate (1-9) mid value = 5
Ones digit = EMF sampling time (1-9) mid value = 5
100 = 'Spread Spectrum' sampling rate for reduced noise, with medium sampling time
(131 + mantissa * 4) * 2 exp. Bits 0-4 = mantissa, Bits 5-7 = exp
Acceleration/Deceleration time (momentum) can be streched in the lower speed range
Tens digit = percentage of speed range to be included (0-9)
Raising or lowering the speed to the next internal step occurs only if the precedingstep is nearly reached.The tolerance
for reaching the preceding step is defined by this CV (the smaller this value the smoother the acceleration/deceleration)
Ones digit = Internal Speed Step x4 (0-9)
can not be used with this
Generates pulse chain commands for LGB sound modules on FO 1
Tens digit sets cycle time(0-9), or start up time for soft start (0-9 = 0 - 0.9s)
Auto Turn Off delay time (0-255 = 0 - 25.5 sec)

display.item: Direction Dependent stops with asymmetrical DCC

label.label: Entered value multiplied by 0.4 seconds is the additional accel/decel
added to the normal CV3 and CV4 setting, for speed changes due to ABC
Tens and Ones digits = Assymmetrical threshold in tenths of a volt
